member.name: T:AutoCADTools.UFLayoutErstellen
member.summary: This class provides the window and methods to create a new layout. There is the possibility to create simple layout or layouts with textfields basing on the database and using existing drawing frames for the layout extends.

member.name: M:AutoCADTools.UFLayoutErstellen.#ctor
member.summary: Initiates a new instance of the create layout class. It looks if the user is in modelspace and will otherwise give a message and stop the command. Initiates the components and loads the available printers. Creating this form should just be enabled in ModelSpace, otherwise the results are probably nor as wanted.

member.summary: Loads all available printers and their paperformats to use them for the dialog

member.summary: Command to manually create the extends of the wanted layout. The user is asked to choose lower left extend and upper right extend.
member.param: the object sending the event to start the command

member.name: M:AutoCADTools.UFLayoutErstellen.AusschnittErkennen
member.summary: Tries to automatically find the wanted extract for the layout. Therefore the drawing area is used. If there is no drawing area created yet it is created using the "ZeichenbereichAuto"-command.
member.returns: true if a drawing frame exists, false if not

member.name: M:AutoCADTools.UFLayoutErstellen.Berstellen_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Creates a new layout when clicking the "create" button. This function just calls the "CreateLayout" method.
member.param: the object sending the event to start the command

member.name: M:AutoCADTools.UFLayoutErstellen.CreateLayout
member.summary: Creates the defined layout. Given error messages if there are mistakes in the drawing unit, the scale, if no corners are defined, if there is no layoutname or no paperformat and then will stop the command. If the layout already exists a warning is given and asked to overwrite it.
